name: file-manager
description: Manage files within a sandboxed /data/ directory. Supports reading, writing, listing, and deleting files and directories.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: file_manager
toolDefinition.description: Perform file operations (read, write, list, delete) within the sandboxed /data/ directory. All paths are resolved relative to /data/ and cannot escape it.

action.description: The file operation to perform: read (get file contents), write (create/overwrite file), list (list directory contents), delete (remove file or directory)

path.description: The file or directory path relative to /data/ (e.g., 'notes/todo.txt')

content.description: The content to write to the file (required for write action)
